interview.title: Motorsport, Make & Competition
interview.text: Click the image to make your choice.

editor.title: Decal Editor
editor.text:
Add, remove and tweak (size, angle, colour, …) features on your decal here. Then position the features on your decal till you are happy. Enjoy Designing!

For further help, watch our design tutorials .

checkout.title: Decals & Order Preferences
checkout.text:
Review these before purchasing.

Scroll to view all your decals.

selectmap.title: I'm a Decal
selectmap.text:
This is your graphics kit from the pilot/cockpit perspective. Select a decal to:

  • Edit the decal
  • Pick a different decal
  • Remove the decal ☹

targetcategorywarning.title: Generic Decals
targetcategorywarning.text1:
Select decals that best fit the panels on your vehicle.

1. Measure your panel size

2. Pick a decal that fits
targetcategorywarning.text2: More details

error.title: An error has occurred
error.sorry: We're sorry, but there has been a technical malfunction and your action could not be completed.
error.investigating: The error has been logged and our engineering team will be investigating the cause.
error.ajax_error: You are offline. Reconnect to ensure design is not lost. Do not close window until saved.

loading_xs.msg1: Building your design, we are almost done
loading_xs.msg2: Save your kit to edit the design later
loading_xs.msg3: Tracked, free shipping to your door
loading_xs.msg4: To design come back on a larger screen

interview.start_your_engines: Get ready to design, we are almost done
interview.start_your_engines2: Save your kit to edit the design later
interview.start_your_engines3: Tracked, free shipping to your door
interview.toast_ruleset_automatically_skipped: We have no regulations for {{country}}. Click here to change country

promptedfeatures.no_features_message: We have all the information required to create your Design...
promptedfeatures.title: Discovery

editor.maximum_scale_user_added_graphic_warning: Maximum scale for uploaded graphic. For a larger graphic in your design, upload a better quality image file. More details
editor.file_size_min_warning: Sorry the graphic is too small to print. Please upload a larger graphic. More details
editor.file_size_limit_warning: Graphic file sizes cannot be larger than 1MB. More details
editor.image_upload_search_by_keyword: We upload the most popular colours from your image. When designing search "upload" to use colours
editor.linked_feature_flash: This feature has been updated elsewhere in the kit.
editor.wrong_file_type: Only the following file types are currently supported: PNG & JPEG

selector.select_material_description: All the decals in your kit will be changed to the selected material (where applicable).
selector.start_new_design_warning: By starting a new kit you will lose the design you are working on. Save it now so you can come back later.
selector.save_design_failed: Could not save your design at this time. This may be due to a technical error in Motocal, or your design may be too large. Please try again later.
selector.mirror_features_warning: WARNING: Copied decals are not always identical. Please double-check your design after copying. Please read all text to ensure it is correct. Then fine tune if necessary.
selector.material_flash_warning: You have changed all the decals in your graphics kit to the '{{material}}' material (where applicable). More details
selector.email_prompt: We will send you a link so that you can access your design later.

clear_modal.keep_personal_features_message: The features selected here will remain on your design.

selector.social_share_text: Share your design with a friend or a group of friends to show them your masterpiece!
selector.themes_confirm_body: Your current work may be lost if you change theme. Do you want to continue?
selector.autoadd_matching_decal_confirm: Do you want to add the {{name}} to the kit?
selector.autoselect_matching_decal: There is a matching decal for the {{name}}.
selector.autoselect_matching_decal_confirm: Do you want to auto-select this decal?
selector.autoselect_warning: WARNING: Decals are not always identical; please review after you auto-select.

advice.text_1: You have just selected a non-perforated decal for the tank.
advice.text_2: Motocal does not advise this. Read more
advice.text_3: For non-perforated decals the fumes will breakdown the decal's adhesive which shortens the life of the decal.

design_size_alerts.design_size_alerts_5MB: Your Design is using 25% of its allocated space; upload your own images once and you can use them in multiple positions.
design_size_alerts.design_size_alerts_10MB: Your Design is using 50% of its allocated space; upload your own images once and you can use them in multiple positions.
design_size_alerts.design_size_alerts_20MB: Your Design is using 100% of its allocated space; you may no longer be able to save further additions.

marketing_section.headline: SUBMIT YOUR CREATION TO WIN
marketing_section.paragraph_1: At Motocal we see a huge number and variety of amazing designs every week.
marketing_section.paragraph_2: There are always a few standout designs though. They have a great colour combo, pattern or layout that really works with the vehicle. We'd like to share these designs and make them available as a theme that can be used and customised by everyone.
marketing_section.paragraph_3: If you think your design has what it takes to feature as a theme, fill out the form below and click submit.
marketing_section.previous_submitted_design_link: Click here to see previous submitted designs

design_description.label: DESCRIBE YOUR DESIGN
design_description.placeholder: A traditional design using simple shapes and factory colours.

become_designer.label: I want to be a Motocal Designer

success.title: Submitted Design
success.body: Well done, your design has now been submitted. We will be in contact with results when all designs have been reviewed.

coming_soon.title: COMING SOON!
coming_soon.body: Our Motocal Designer submission page is almost ready. As soon as it’s available you’ll receive an email to let you know.

error.title: Submitted Design
error.body_1: Unfortunately there is a technical error and we have not received your design. Please check you have internet and re-submit. If the problem persists please contact us at info@motocal.com and we will help you out.

coming_soon.body: We are still developing this feature to improve your experience of Motocal. Please log in to hear more.

checkout.agree_terms: By clicking 'Place Order' you agree to the Terms & Conditions.

terms_and_conditions.error_message: There was an error loading the terms and conditions. Please try again later, or send an email to our team: info@motocal.com

regulationwarnings.regulatedposition: WARNING: This position is a regulated position, changing its design may conflict with the selected regulation.
regulationwarnings.regulatedfeature: WARNING: Changing this feature may conflict with regulations selected.
